item.title: [Crash] bm_c2a5a (Surface Tension)
item.dc:creator: DaftMink
item.description:
Okay noticing some cosmetic bugs on this map too.

First the dam is missing a texture underwater.
Above water: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96183219
Below water: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96182420

Also the exit pipes alittle past the dam due this.
Close up: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96183818
Faraway: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96182296

Read full topic
